<h1 class="govuk-heading-xl govuk-!-margin-top-6 govuk-!-margin-bottom-6">Tables and Data</h1>

```{python}
#| echo: false
from IPython.display import HTML
import pandas as pd
test_data = pd.read_csv("test-data.csv")
html = test_data.to_html(classes="govuk-table", index=False, border=0)
html = html.replace("<th ", "<th style='text-align: left;' ")
html = html.replace("<td>", "<td style='text-align: left;'>")
HTML(html)
```
